# thunder_debug_l7session (Resource)

`thunder_debug_l7session`: Debug L7 session processing

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_debug_l7session" "thunder_debug_l7session" {
  level = 1
}
```
